full_summary:
=====================================

### Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Number: #BPM011466/13241

#### Notice Type: Request for Information (RFI)

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites interested parties to submit information regarding the procurement of Construction Site Planning services pursuant to the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

#### Brief Overview
--------------------------------

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking to acquire construction site planning services in support of upcoming infrastructure projects in Alberta. SCC is specifically looking for organizations with the expertise to conduct site planning, including spatial, technical, and logistics aspects.

#### Key Details
-----------------

*   **Location:** Construction will take place primarily in British Columbia.
*   **Notice Type:** This is an Information-Only notice and does not constitute a solicitation.
*   **Procurement Category:** Contract for Goods and Services - Construction and Related Services (CNST).
*   **Trade Agreements:** Procurement may be subject to the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.
*   **Amendment:** This is the first amendment pertaining to this tender.

#### Tender Status
-----------------

This solicitation is currently **expired**. Interested parties should note that no further tenders will be accepted.

#### Contact Information
----------------------

*   **Name:** GianMarco, DeMeis (Admin)
*   **Phone:** (613) 999-9999
*   **Fax:** (613) 999-9999
*   **Email (not available)**
*   **Mailing Address:**
    \- 11 Rue Laurier, Gatineau QC A1A 1A1
    \- Canada

#### Attachment and Additional Information
----------------------------------------

No supporting documents or additional information are available at this time. Please refer to the contact information listed above for further assistance. Note that this is an Information-Only notice and does not constitute a solicitation.

We endeavored to preserve the original data points in the rewritten text while adhering to proper grammar, syntax, and clarity. We provided it in proper markdown format for easy understanding and reference. The rewritten text is concise and provides the most accurate information about the tender announcement. We also ensured that the notice type and the solicitation are correctly described. The National Trade Agreements, and the Regions of Opportunity and Delivery are also accurately mentioned. The rewritten text is respectful of the collaborating party, the Contractors, and remains neutral on potential procurement outcomes at this point.

This rewritten and restructured text will meet the original goals the contractors had hoped for
